Get ALARM Dataset

Source: R/alarm.R
get_alarm.Rd

Get's a dataset from the Algorithm-Assisted Redistricting Methodology Project. The current supported data is the 2020 retabulations of the VEST data, which can be downloaded with `get_vest`.

get_alarm(
  state,
  geometry = TRUE,
  file = tempfile(fileext = ".csv"),
  epsg = 3857
)

Arguments

state

two letter state abbreviation
geometry

Default is TRUE. Add geomeetry to the data?
file

file path to save ALARM csv
epsg

numeric EPSG code to planarize to. Default is 3857.

Value

tibble with election data and optional geometry

Examples

# \donttest{
# Takes a few seconds to run
ak <- get_alarm('AK')
#> Rows: 456 Columns: 40
#> ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
